vernac_cmds: Definition new_inc_count (m : Message) := match m with | inc_dec s => 1%Z | _ => 0%Z end.
Remark aux1 : forall c : Config, legal c -> st c owner = (sigma_receive_table (rt c) + sigma_weight (bm c) - sigma_table_but_owner Z (fun (_ : Site) (x : Z) => x) (st c) - 1)%Z.
generalize (sigma_table_but_owner Z (fun (_ : Site) (x : Z) => x) (st c)).
Remark aux2 : forall c : Config, legal c -> sigma_table_but_owner Z (fun (_ : Site) (x : Z) => x) (st c) = sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => sigma_rooted s (bm c)).

Remark aux3 : forall (s1 s2 : Site) (q : queue Message), (cardinal q - sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => rooted s s1 s2 q))%Z = reduce Message (fun a : Message => (cardinal_count a - sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => rooted_fun s s1 s2 a))%Z) q.

Remark aux4 : forall t : Site -> Site -> queue Message, sigma2_table Site LS LS (queue Message) (fun (s1 s2 : Site) (q : queue Message) => (cardinal q - sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => rooted s s1 s2 q))%Z) t = sigma2_table Site LS LS (queue Message) (fun (s1 s2 : Site) (q : queue Message) => reduce Message (fun a : Message => (cardinal_count a - sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => rooted_fun s s1 s2 a))%Z) q) t.

Remark aux5 : forall c : Config, legal c -> sigma2_table Site LS LS (queue Message) (fun (s1 s2 : Site) (q : queue Message) => reduce Message (fun a : Message => (cardinal_count a - sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => rooted_fun s s1 s2 a))%Z) q) (bm c) = (sigma2_table Site LS LS (queue Message) (fun (s1 s2 : Site) (q : queue Message) => if eq_site_dec s2 owner then reduce Message dec_count q else 0) (bm c) + sigma2_table Site LS LS (queue Message) (fun (s1 s2 : Site) (q : queue Message) => if eq_site_dec s1 owner then reduce Message copy_count q else 0) (bm c) - sigma2_table Site LS LS (queue Message) (fun (s1 s2 : Site) (q : queue Message) => reduce Message new_inc_count q) (bm c))%Z.
generalize (empty_queue2 c H s1 s2 owner).
replace (cardinal_count d0 - sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => rooted_fun s owner s2 d0))%Z with (copy_count d0 - new_inc_count d0)%Z.
replace (cardinal_count d0 - sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => rooted_fun s s1 s2 d0))%Z with (- new_inc_count d0)%Z.

Lemma simpl_dec_sum : forall c : Config, legal c -> sigma2_table Site LS LS (queue Message) (fun (s1 s2 : Site) (q : queue Message) => if eq_site_dec s2 owner then reduce Message dec_count q else 0%Z) (bm c) = sigma_table Site LS Z (Z_id Site) (fun s1 : Site => reduce Message dec_count (bm c s1 owner)).
rewrite (sigma_sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec (fun s : Site => match eq_site_dec s owner with | left _ => reduce Message dec_count (bm c e s) | right _ => 0%Z end)).
replace (sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => match eq_site_dec s owner with | left _ => reduce Message dec_count (bm c e s) | right _ => 0%Z end)) with 0%Z.

Lemma simpl_copy_sum : forall c : Config, legal c -> sigma2_table Site LS LS (queue Message) (fun (s1 _ : Site) (q : queue Message) => match eq_site_dec s1 owner with | left _ => reduce Message copy_count q | right _ => 0%Z end) (bm c) = sigma_table Site LS Z (Z_id Site) (fun s2 : Site => reduce Message copy_count (bm c owner s2)).

rewrite (sigma_sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec (fun s : Site => Z_id Site s (sigma Site LS (fun s0 : Site => match eq_site_dec s owner with | left _ => reduce Message copy_count (bm c s s0) | right _ => 0%Z end)))).

replace (sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => Z_id Site s (sigma Site LS (fun s0 : Site => match eq_site_dec s owner with | left _ => reduce Message copy_count (bm c s s0) | right _ => 0%Z end)))) with 0%Z.
Lemma no_inc_dec : forall q : queue Message, (forall s0 : Site, ~ In_queue Message (inc_dec s0) q) -> reduce Message new_inc_count q = 0%Z.

Lemma simpl_inc_sum : forall c : Config, legal c -> sigma2_table Site LS LS (queue Message) (fun (_ _ : Site) (q : queue Message) => reduce Message new_inc_count q) (bm c) = sigma_table Site LS Z (Z_id Site) (fun s1 : Site => reduce Message new_inc_count (bm c s1 owner)).
rewrite (sigma_sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec (fun s : Site => reduce Message new_inc_count (b e s))) .
replace (sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => reduce Message new_inc_count (b e s))) with 0%Z.
rewrite (sigma_sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec (fun s : Site => reduce Message new_inc_count (b e s))) .
replace (sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => reduce Message new_inc_count (b e s))) with 0%Z.
generalize (H1 e s H n H2).
Remark add_reduce : forall x y a u w z : Z, (y - a)%Z = (z + w - u)%Z -> (x + y - a - 1)%Z = (x + z + w - u - 1)%Z.

Lemma invariant4 : forall c : Config, legal c -> st c owner = (sigma_receive_table (rt c) + sigma_table Site LS Z (Z_id Site) (fun s1 : Site => reduce Message dec_count (bm c s1 owner)) + sigma_table Site LS Z (Z_id Site) (fun s2 : Site => reduce Message copy_count (bm c owner s2)) - sigma_table Site LS Z (Z_id Site) (fun s1 : Site => reduce Message new_inc_count (bm c s1 owner)) - 1)%Z.

command: generalize (sigma_table_but_owner Z (fun (_ : Site) (x : Z) => x) (st c)).
generalize (empty_queue2 c H s1 s2 owner).
replace (cardinal_count d0 - sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => rooted_fun s owner s2 d0))%Z with (copy_count d0 - new_inc_count d0)%Z.
replace (cardinal_count d0 - sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => rooted_fun s s1 s2 d0))%Z with (- new_inc_count d0)%Z.
rewrite (sigma_sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec (fun s : Site => match eq_site_dec s owner with | left _ => reduce Message dec_count (bm c e s) | right _ => 0%Z end)).
replace (sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => match eq_site_dec s owner with | left _ => reduce Message dec_count (bm c e s) | right _ => 0%Z end)) with 0%Z.

rewrite (sigma_sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec (fun s : Site => Z_id Site s (sigma Site LS (fun s0 : Site => match eq_site_dec s owner with | left _ => reduce Message copy_count (bm c s s0) | right _ => 0%Z end)))).

replace (sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => Z_id Site s (sigma Site LS (fun s0 : Site => match eq_site_dec s owner with | left _ => reduce Message copy_count (bm c s s0) | right _ => 0%Z end)))) with 0%Z.
rewrite (sigma_sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec (fun s : Site => reduce Message new_inc_count (b e s))) .
replace (sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => reduce Message new_inc_count (b e s))) with 0%Z.
rewrite (sigma_sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec (fun s : Site => reduce Message new_inc_count (b e s))) .
replace (sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => reduce Message new_inc_count (b e s))) with 0%Z.
generalize (H1 e s H n H2).
